title: MEMS Devices
description: Introduces fundamental concepts and tools needed for the design, simulation and analysis of MEMS devices.  These include electrical, mechanical, radiant, thermal, magnetic and chemical domains.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 6229 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 6229 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 6450 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
